name: And then there were two...
description:
You have crash-landed on an old and ruined world and your helpless human masters are the only two left alive. They are being attacked by...slimes? Hold them back as long as you can, but realize that in the end, we all must perish!

Keep Bob and Joe alive with your two remaining bots, when Joe or Bob dies, their bot deactivates, and the other bot can't go very far without its friend!

WASD to move

Q and E to move your bots (Q)loser and (Ey)way

Left Click to shoot. 

Stay alive as long as possible! Good luck!

This is our first time submitting to a game jam! Hope you like it!

https://www.dafont.com/thaleahfat.font was used in the making of this game.
